name: ChargersFan
0:
”Alexa, open Chargers fan.”
”Alexa, ask Chargers fan for a flash briefing on the Chargers.”
”Alexa, ask Chargers fan about the previous game score.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chargers fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Chargers by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Chargers.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Chargers Fan how are the Chargers doing? 

Alexa, ask Chargers Fan who do the Chargers play next?

Alexa, ask Chargers Fan Philip Rivers (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Chargers:


Alexa, ask Chargers Fan to tell me some trivia about the Chargers. 

Alexa, ask Chargers Fan how many Super Bowls have the Chargers won?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
